content.body:
### Shop 385/65R22.5 Tire Size
The 385/65R22.5 is a wide-base Super Single commercial tire that’s designed to take the place of dual rear wheels on semi-tractors and heavy trucks. Super Singles have the advantage of lower rolling resistance, enhanced load capacity, and lower weight. 385/65R22.5 is also a tire size that’s used for some off-the-road (OTR) and industrial applications as well.

Looking for a new set of 385/65R22.5 tires? Take a look at the Bridgestone R244, Continental Conti HAC 3, Michelin XZY3 Wide Base, [Falken GI378](https://simpletire.com/brands/falken-tires/gi-378), and Sumitomo ST520 as each tire offers great traction and performance at an even better value.

Whether you need a Super Single or an off-the-road tire, SimpleTire has a set of 385/65R22.5 tires that meets your needs at a great price!

info.title: Did you know?
info.body: A reliable brand is the #1 ask for most drivers. Here you can shop all the most popular brands and discover new ones – all tested, ranked and rated by our customers.
